Detailed Description

Configuration class for a softkey assignment. Following assignments are possible:
  • Feature specified via AppFeatureID
  • Context menu specified via MenuID
In both cases, it is possible to configure an optional text for cases, when the softkey should display a different text than the feature item contains.

FeatureItem * SoftkeyDesc::GetSoftkeyFeatureItem (  INT  sk_id  )  const
 

Parameters:
sk_id Softkey index
Returns:
In case of a context menu, an "OpenMenu" context feature is initialized with the configured context menu. If the configured context menu contains only one menu item, this item will be assigned directly to the softkey. In case a feature is configured, the feature will be fetched from FeatureBroker and returned.
